TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXFileRef/Converter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器以便将 的数据与字符串来回转换。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for a to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个提供的对象引用。A provides the object the refers to. 例如，如果是"xplogo.bmp;System.Drawing.Bitmap、 System.Drawing"，然后调用转换器的方法将返回，而不。For example, if the is "xplogo.bmp;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing", then calling the method of the converter will return a , not a . 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基本类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，您并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 改为调用方法的。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
